scripts.k8s:apply: kubectl delete job migrate-job --ignore-not-found=true && kubectl apply -f node-configmap.yaml -f mysql-secrets.yaml -f mysql-deployment.yaml -f mysql-service.yaml && kubectl apply -f migrations-job.yaml && kubectl wait --timeout=60s --for=condition=complete job/migrate-job && kubectl apply -f node-deployment.yaml -f node-service.yaml -f node-hpa.yaml
scripts.k8s:run: yarn k8s:apply && kubectl rollout restart deployment/soat-app && kubectl rollout status deployment/soat-app --timeout=320s && echo 'serviço disponível em http://localhost:3002/ e documentacao em http://localhost:3002/api-docs' && sudo minikube tunnel
